alert.note: Alert for Baraga; Iron; Ontonagon; Southern Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IRON...SOUTHWESTERN HOUGHTON...SOUTHEASTERN ONTONAGON AND SOUTHERN BARAGA COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 224 PM EDT/124 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Nisula to near Bruce Crossing. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Kenton, Bruce Crossing, Alberta, Sidnaw, Three Lakes, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Canyon Falls, Herman, Trout Creek, King Lake, Watton, Craig Lake State Park, Echo Lake, Bob Lake, and Ewen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
